In<S>1722</S> those<S>1565</S> days<S>2250</S> the multitude<S>3793</S> being<S>5607</S> very great<S>3827</S>, and<S>2532</S> having<S>2192</S> nothing<S>3361</S> <S>5101</S> to eat<S>5315</S>, Jesus<S>2424</S> called<S>4341</S> his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S> unto him, and saith<S>3004</S> unto them<S>846</S>,
I have compassion<S>4697</S> on<S>1909</S> the multitude<S>3793</S>, because<S>3754</S> they have<S>4357</S> now<S>2235</S> been<S>4357</S> with me<S>3427</S> three<S>5140</S> days<S>2250</S>, and<S>2532</S> have<S>2192</S> nothing<S>3756</S> <S>5101</S> to eat<S>5315</S>:
And<S>2532</S> if<S>1437</S> I send<S>630</S> them<S>846</S> away<S>630</S> fasting<S>3523</S> to<S>1519</S> their own<S>846</S> houses<S>3624</S>, they will faint<S>1590</S> by<S>1722</S> the way<S>3598</S>: for<S>1063</S> divers<S>5100</S> of them<S>846</S> came<S>2240</S> from far<S>3113</S>.
And<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S> answered<S>611</S> him<S>846</S>, From whence<S>4159</S> can<S>1410</S> a man<S>5100</S> satisfy<S>5526</S> these<S>5128</S> men with bread<S>740</S> here<S>5602</S> in<S>1909</S> the wilderness<S>2047</S>?
And<S>2532</S> he asked<S>1905</S> them<S>846</S>, How many<S>4214</S> loaves<S>740</S> have ye<S>2192</S>? And<S>1161</S> they said<S>2036</S>, Seven<S>2033</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he commanded<S>3853</S> the people<S>3793</S> to sit down<S>377</S> on<S>1909</S> the ground<S>1093</S>: and<S>2532</S> he took<S>2983</S> the seven<S>2033</S> loaves<S>740</S>, and gave thanks<S>2168</S>, and brake<S>2806</S>, and<S>2532</S> gave<S>1325</S> to his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S> to<S>2443</S> set before<S>3908</S> them; and<S>2532</S> they did set them before<S>3908</S> the people<S>3793</S>.
And<S>2532</S> they had<S>2192</S> a few<S>3641</S> small fishes<S>2485</S>: and<S>2532</S> he blessed<S>2127</S>, and commanded<S>2036</S> to set<S>3908</S> them<S>846</S> also<S>2532</S> before<S>3908</S> them.
So<S>1161</S> they did eat<S>5315</S>, and<S>2532</S> were filled<S>5526</S>: and<S>2532</S> they took up<S>142</S> of the broken<S>2801</S> meat that was left<S>4051</S> seven<S>2033</S> baskets<S>4711</S>.
And<S>1161</S> they that had eaten<S>5315</S> were<S>2258</S> about<S>5613</S> four thousand<S>5070</S>: and<S>2532</S> he sent<S>630</S> them<S>846</S> away<S>630</S>.
And<S>2532</S> straightway<S>2112</S> he entered<S>1684</S> into<S>1519</S> a ship<S>4143</S> with<S>3326</S> his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S>, and came<S>2064</S> into<S>1519</S> the parts<S>3313</S> of Dalmanutha<S>1148</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the Pharisees<S>5330</S> came forth<S>1831</S>, and<S>2532</S> began<S>756</S> to question<S>4802</S> with him<S>846</S>, seeking<S>2212</S> of<S>3844</S> him<S>846</S> a sign<S>4592</S> from<S>575</S> heaven<S>3772</S>, tempting<S>3985</S> him<S>846</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he sighed deeply<S>389</S> in his<S>846</S> spirit<S>4151</S>, and saith<S>3004</S>, Why<S>5101</S> doth<S>1934</S> this<S>3778</S> generation<S>1074</S> seek after<S>1934</S> a sign<S>4592</S>? verily<S>281</S> I say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, There shall no<S>1487</S> sign<S>4592</S> be given<S>1325</S> unto this<S>5026</S> generation<S>1074</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he left<S>863</S> them<S>846</S>, and entering<S>1684</S> into<S>1519</S> the ship<S>4143</S> again<S>3825</S> departed<S>565</S> to<S>1519</S> the other side<S>4008</S>.
Now<S>2532</S> the disciples had forgotten<S>1950</S> to take<S>2983</S> bread<S>740</S>, neither<S>2532</S> <S>3756</S> had<S>2192</S> they in<S>1722</S> the ship<S>4143</S> with<S>3326</S> them<S>1438</S> more than<S>1508</S> one<S>1520</S> loaf<S>740</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he charged<S>1291</S> them<S>846</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, Take heed<S>3708</S>, beware<S>991</S> of<S>575</S> the leaven<S>2219</S> of the Pharisees<S>5330</S>, and<S>2532</S> of the leaven<S>2219</S> of Herod<S>2264</S>.
And<S>2532</S> they reasoned<S>1260</S> among<S>4314</S> themselves<S>240</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, It is because<S>3754</S> we have<S>2192</S> no<S>3756</S> bread<S>740</S>.
And<S>2532</S> when Jesus<S>2424</S> knew<S>1097</S> it, he saith<S>3004</S> unto them<S>846</S>, Why<S>5101</S> reason ye<S>1260</S>, because<S>3754</S> ye have<S>2192</S> no<S>3756</S> bread<S>740</S>? perceive ye<S>3539</S> not yet<S>3768</S>, neither<S>3761</S> understand<S>4920</S>? have ye<S>2192</S> your<S>5216</S> heart<S>2588</S> yet<S>2089</S> hardened<S>4456</S>?
Having<S>2192</S> eyes<S>3788</S>, see ye<S>991</S> not<S>3756</S>? and<S>2532</S> having<S>2192</S> ears<S>3775</S>, hear ye<S>191</S> not<S>3756</S>? and<S>2532</S> do ye<S>3421</S> not<S>3756</S> remember<S>3421</S>?
When<S>3753</S> I brake<S>2806</S> the five<S>4002</S> loaves<S>740</S> among<S>1519</S> five thousand<S>4000</S>, how many<S>4214</S> baskets<S>2894</S> full<S>4134</S> of fragments<S>2801</S> took ye up<S>142</S>? They say<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Twelve<S>1427</S>.
And<S>1161</S> when<S>3753</S> the seven<S>2033</S> among<S>1519</S> four thousand<S>5070</S>, how many<S>4214</S> baskets<S>4711</S> full<S>4138</S> of fragments<S>2801</S> took ye up<S>142</S>? And<S>1161</S> they said<S>2036</S>, Seven<S>2033</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he said<S>3004</S> unto them<S>846</S>, How<S>4459</S> is it that ye do<S>4920</S> not<S>3756</S> understand<S>4920</S>?
And<S>2532</S> he cometh<S>2064</S> to<S>1519</S> Bethsaida<S>966</S>; and<S>2532</S> they bring<S>5342</S> a blind man<S>5185</S> unto him<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> besought<S>3870</S> him<S>846</S> to<S>2443</S> touch<S>680</S> him<S>846</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he took<S>1949</S> the blind man<S>5185</S> by the hand<S>5495</S>, and led<S>1806</S> him<S>846</S> out of<S>1854</S> the town<S>2968</S>; and<S>2532</S> when he had spit<S>4429</S> on<S>1519</S> his<S>846</S> eyes<S>3659</S>, and put<S>2007</S> his hands<S>5495</S> upon him<S>846</S>, he asked<S>1905</S> him<S>846</S> if<S>1536</S> he saw<S>991</S> ought<S>1536</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he looked up<S>308</S>, and said<S>3004</S>,<S>3754</S> I see<S>991</S> men<S>444</S> as<S>5613</S> <S>3708</S> trees<S>1186</S>, walking<S>4043</S>.
After<S>1534</S> that he put<S>2007</S> his hands<S>5495</S> again<S>3825</S> upon<S>1909</S> his<S>846</S> eyes<S>3788</S>, and<S>2532</S> made<S>4160</S> him<S>846</S> look up<S>308</S>: and<S>2532</S> he was restored<S>600</S>, and<S>2532</S> saw<S>1689</S> every man<S>537</S> clearly<S>5081</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he sent<S>649</S> him<S>846</S> away<S>649</S> to<S>1519</S> his<S>846</S> house<S>3624</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, Neither<S>3366</S> go<S>1525</S> into<S>1519</S> the town<S>2968</S>, nor<S>3366</S> tell<S>2036</S> it to any<S>5100</S> in<S>1722</S> the town<S>2968</S>.
And<S>2532</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> went out<S>1831</S>, and<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S>, into<S>1519</S> the towns<S>2968</S> of Caesarea<S>2542</S> Philippi<S>5376</S>: and<S>2532</S> by<S>1722</S> the way<S>3598</S> he asked<S>1905</S> his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S>, saying<S>3004</S> unto them<S>846</S>, Whom<S>5101</S> do<S>3004</S> men<S>444</S> say<S>3004</S> that I<S>3165</S> am<S>1511</S>?
And<S>1161</S> they answered<S>611</S>, John<S>2491</S> the Baptist<S>910</S>: but<S>1161</S> some<S>243</S> say, Elias<S>2243</S>; and<S>2532</S> others<S>243</S>, One<S>1520</S> of the prophets<S>4396</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he<S>846</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto them<S>846</S>, But<S>1161</S> whom<S>5101</S> say<S>3004</S> ye<S>5210</S> that I<S>3165</S> am<S>1511</S>? And<S>1161</S> Peter<S>4074</S> answereth<S>611</S> and saith<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Thou<S>4771</S> art<S>1488</S> the Christ<S>5547</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he charged<S>2008</S> them<S>846</S> that<S>2443</S> they should tell<S>3004</S> no man<S>3367</S> of<S>4012</S> him<S>846</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he began<S>756</S> to teach<S>1321</S> them<S>846</S>, that<S>3754</S> the Son<S>5207</S> of man<S>444</S> must<S>1163</S> suffer<S>3958</S> many things<S>4183</S>, and<S>2532</S> be rejected<S>593</S> of<S>575</S> the elders<S>4245</S>, and<S>2532</S> of the chief priests<S>749</S>, and<S>2532</S> scribes<S>1122</S>, and<S>2532</S> be killed<S>615</S>, and<S>2532</S> after<S>3326</S> three<S>5140</S> days<S>2250</S> rise again<S>450</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he spake<S>2980</S> that saying<S>3056</S> openly<S>3954</S>. And<S>2532</S> Peter<S>4074</S> took<S>4355</S> him<S>846</S>, and began<S>756</S> to rebuke<S>2008</S> him<S>846</S>.
But<S>1161</S> when he had turned about<S>1994</S> and<S>2532</S> looked<S>1492</S> on his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S>, he rebuked<S>2008</S> Peter<S>4074</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, Get thee<S>5217</S> behind<S>3694</S> me<S>3450</S>, Satan<S>4567</S>: for<S>3754</S> thou savourest<S>5426</S> not<S>3756</S> the things that be of God<S>2316</S>, but<S>235</S> the things that be of men<S>444</S>.
And<S>2532</S> when he had called<S>4341</S> the people<S>3793</S> unto him with<S>4862</S> his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S> also, he said<S>2036</S> unto them<S>846</S>, Whosoever<S>3748</S> will<S>2309</S> come<S>2064</S> after<S>3694</S> me<S>3450</S>, let him deny<S>533</S> himself<S>1438</S>, and<S>2532</S> take up<S>142</S> his<S>846</S> cross<S>4716</S>, and<S>2532</S> follow<S>190</S> me<S>3427</S>.
For<S>1063</S> whosoever<S>3739</S> <S>302</S> will<S>2309</S> save<S>4982</S> his<S>846</S> life<S>5590</S> shall lose<S>622</S> it<S>846</S>; but<S>1161</S> whosoever<S>3739</S> <S>302</S> shall lose<S>622</S> his<S>846</S> life<S>5590</S> for<S>1752</S> my sake<S>1700</S> and<S>2532</S> the gospel's<S>2098</S>, the same<S>3778</S> shall save<S>4982</S> it<S>846</S>.
For<S>1063</S> what<S>5101</S> shall it profit<S>5623</S> a man<S>444</S>, if<S>1437</S> he shall gain<S>2770</S> the whole<S>3650</S> world<S>2889</S>, and<S>2532</S> lose<S>2210</S> his own<S>846</S> soul<S>5590</S>?
Or<S>2228</S> what<S>5101</S> shall<S>1325</S> a man<S>444</S> give<S>1325</S> in exchange<S>465</S> for his<S>846</S> soul<S>5590</S>?
Whosoever<S>3739</S> <S>302</S> therefore<S>1063</S> shall be ashamed<S>1870</S> of me<S>3165</S> and<S>2532</S> of my<S>1699</S> words<S>3056</S> in<S>1722</S> this<S>5026</S> adulterous<S>3428</S> and<S>2532</S> sinful<S>268</S> generation<S>1074</S>; of him<S>846</S> also<S>2532</S> shall<S>1870</S> the Son<S>5207</S> of man<S>444</S> be ashamed<S>1870</S>, when<S>3752</S> he cometh<S>2064</S> in<S>1722</S> the glory<S>1391</S> of his<S>846</S> Father<S>3962</S> with<S>3326</S> the holy<S>40</S> angels<S>32</S>.
